thread.title: Barry Paster - Barris Kustom, Ind.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Barry Paster - Barris Kustom, Ind.

author: Barry Paster - Barris Kustom, Ind.
title: Barry Paster - Barris Kustom, Ind.
text:
We only use the Pelican system in the custom homes will build. No more old technology service issues and the pre-filter system is extremely easy for the Home Owner to handle themselves!
Now with the addition of the UV protection add on, it really completes a truly modern, carbon based system that is absolutely hassle free!
